data.title: Echoes of Eternity
data.description: In a futuristic world, two outcasts find unexpected friendship and uncover a mystery that could change the course of history.

data.title: The Godfather
data.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

data.title: The Dark Knight
data.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

data.title: Schindler's List
data.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

data.title: Pulp Fiction
data.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

data.title: Forrest Gump
data.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

data.title: The Matrix
data.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth about the reality of his world.

data.title: Inception
data.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

data.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
data.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

data.title: Fight Club
data.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

data.title: Interstellar
data.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

data.title: The Silence of the Lambs
data.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

data.title: Se7en
data.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

data.title: The Green Mile
data.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

data.title: Gladiator
data.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

data.title: Braveheart
data.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

data.title: Titanic
data.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

data.title: Avatar
data.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

data.title: Saving Private Ryan
data.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

data.title: The Lion King
data.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

data.title: Neon Rebellion
data.description: In a dystopian metropolis, a renegade hacker teams up with underground rebels to expose a totalitarian regime, igniting a spark of hope that could transform their divided society.
